html:
9.21.18  2:51 am   Describe the UK please 

     it's like if you take some kingdoms, and then unite the hell out of them

9.21.18  2:31 am   i notice that in an earlier question you noted calm as part of your repertoire. what else can you repertoire?

     freaking the hell out

9.21.18  2:27 am   bill, tips on not getting shampoo in your eyes while in the shower?

     you must keep the shampoo in a separate shower

9.21.18  2:22 am   Surreal, bro. Are you me for real??

     it is possible

9.21.18  2:21 am   bill i know we're all thinking it here's my question: what planet are you from

     the blue one with the nice seasons

9.21.18  2:19 am   what to do if you accidentally inhale frog

     you can go ahead and exhale it

9.21.18  1:53 am   Since trees are in a lot of your songs n' stuff, what is your favorite kind of tree?

     i don't really know which kinds are which ..... all of them are actually a little different

9.21.18  12:26 am   I've been trying to get into content creation vaguely similar to your style for a while, every time you make a new song it simultaneously encourages and discourages me, because I know it'll be a long time before I'm even as good as your 2010 days, and here you are pumping out songs every 2 weeks. This isn't really a question so I guess, why are you so good at consistently rising above expectations?

     the trick is to keep lowering them, then it appears as though you are rising above them

9.21.18  12:24 am   afraid of music

     it can be very powerful and dangerous

9.21.18  12:13 am   is there any crime or action you think is 100% unforgivable or irredeemable?

      forgiving too many crimes

9.20.18  11:57 pm   do you write out a script or just create as the thoughts come?

     it depends whether i am making something that is possible to be delivered live in real time by 1 person

9.20.18  11:29 pm   https://www.instagram.com/p/Bn5B0XuHzet/?taken-by=notbillwurtz What's this mean?

     that triggered the mount st helens song

9.20.18  11:22 pm   new video is incredibly fire. have you ever consumed art that was so exciting and fresh that it was actually sort of painful, and you keep almost closing it/putting it down because the border between pain and amazement is becoming too blurry, which makes you not know how to feel for a little bit? But in a good way?

     yes

9.20.18  10:58 pm   what is potato

     seems to be some sort of communication device

9.20.18  10:48 pm   What happens when the talk show host cuts to commercial for 'station identification'?

     that's when the real talk ensues

9.20.18  10:00 pm   What's a paradigm? 

     look around you

9.20.18  9:54 pm   School starts too damn early, what should I do?

     start even earlier. beat them at their own game

9.20.18  9:14 pm   what to do about brain hurt

     use body

9.20.18  9:00 pm   You clearly are able to focus on the immediate, to focus wholly on ggeting tasks done. And yet, you also seem to be constantly aware of the entire universe around you. How do you do it?

     am universe

9.20.18  8:52 pm   everything is so infinitely interesting and it makes me physically ill sometimes.

     i know what you mean

9.20.18  7:43 pm   do you get questions from all over the world

     yes but probably not every place

9.20.18  7:38 pm   Do you ever struggle with wondering if a piece of work is "good enough"?

     yes

9.20.18  7:15 pm   does MSHiatBU change time signatures at any point? maybe i wasn't paying attention but it seemed like it was in 4/4 the whole time.

     there's an extra 2 beats before the second verse, and the entire outtro is in 6/4

     maybe people mean to say that some parts are syncopated ? like at 1:07, the rhythm just gets a little weird when you are talking about the people leaving your office cause you havent been paying them much anymore.

     that's all in 4

      i'm thinking people are also talking about 1:18 and 1:47 when the rhythm changes a little but i think it still stays in 4/4

9.20.18  7:02 pm   Will you ever make a music video for 'got to know what's going on'? It's a very good song btw

     i will do it

9.20.18  6:59 pm   What made you want to start making this awesome music? 

     just thought that would be awesome

9.20.18  6:37 pm   Hey Bill, I've been reading through the past week or so of questions and answers and I have noticed a trend in how you answer questions, and I assume it is completely intentional and an extension of the persona that you display in your songs, which in itself is cool and honestly pretty damn endearing due to the sideways and sometimes really succinct and brief ways you answer most complex questions/comments that I or most other people would elaborate upon.

     that is to distract you from all the hundreds of other times i have answered those same questions in excrutiatingly elaborate detail

      My guess for why you rarely elaborate on any answer you give (especially in regards to questions about you or your music) is because you either want people to figure it out for themselves or its just personal and (I assume) you don't want to divulge that information about yourself, both of which are respectable and genuine reasons. However as someone who just wants to know whats going on inside that brilliant brain of yours, it drives me absolutely insane! You so very clearly have ideas you want to convey a nd messages you want to communicate with everyone, and about 80% of these questions have genuine answers about motivation, attitude and inspiration, all of which are actually GREAT advice! If possible could you give an explanation of a lot of the motivation behind your songs?

     i've discovered that songs can unlock some of the deepest powers of the universe

      or at least in some way tell us a message or central idea you want your audience to take away from your music.

     the world has infinite power and it's on your side

      And don't worry, i'm not expecting a direct answer, both because you're not a very direct person in your responses most of the time, and more so because all great teachers of philosophy and introspective thought never just tell people what they are trying to get them to understand.

     ah, that's true. i think showing can be more effective than telling. even better than showing is if you can get them to actually do it ... or, for a twist, realize they already have done it

      I really really want a full response so I can understand your thought process. To be more clear, i'm not asking for a "moral of the story" message or anything like that, I'm asking more if there is a method of thought that you live by that leaks through in your songs? Because you have a very unique way of making song s that a lways seems to have deep and intertwining themes. If possible can you walk us through your philosophical approach to the world around you and your attitude towards trials in life as well as your way of expressing this through your music?

     that could take a lifetime but i am doing it anyway

     Don't worry, i'm already expecting on getting goofed on with a one word response, or getting a really backwards answer. I just figured that I might as well try and ask all this stuff. Because after all, where is the harm in asking.

9.20.18  6:33 pm   Can we hear your laugh or can you visualize it for us?

     is it just me or is asking someone to laugh kind of creepy

9.20.18  6:25 pm   Would you ever consider making one more shirt design with the shirt being black, with your umbrella design much bigger in the front and on the back it would read, "Rising to the occasion of mountains, trees, and other big things or whatever"

     that sounds cool but not like something i would say

9.20.18  6:24 pm   What's your schedule billI'm loving the new stuff 

     2 weeks or die trying

9.20.18  6:21 pm   Have you ever written a song in locrian? If so I want to hear it 

     all my songs are in locrian

9.20.18  6:15 pm   Are you Mount St. Helens?

     no but i played that role last week

9.20.18  6:07 pm   What do you think of the idea that all your music sounds the same? I just saw the idea floating around

     if it all sounds the same then i hope it's good

9.20.18  5:51 pm   If you were forced against your will to tour the world with a show, what would be in the show? Asking for a mate.

     if it was against my will then it would have to be a show i didn't want to do. so then let's say a lot of pre-recorded backing tracks

9.20.18  5:47 pm   are you trying something new?

     yes

9.20.18  5:36 pm   is there a meaning to this life?

     much more

9.20.18  5:35 pm   Do you suffer from de-personalization?

     no

      I get those vibes from your music sometimes.

9.20.18  4:41 pm   Can you fuck a raptor?

     only if you are a raptor also

9.20.18  4:20 pm   You seem to like to describe already successful people in your songs.

     i don't recall doing that but i believe you

9.20.18  3:59 pm   What is better - to be born good, or to overcome your evil nature through great effort?

     everyone is born evil and outgrows it effortlessly

9.20.18  2:22 pm   how can you create something so dumb yet so beautiful

     the entire fabric of our universe is dumb. all beauty must therefore be made from dumbness

9.20.18  1:57 pm   how cryptic is too cryptic? thanks 

     just cryptic enough

9.20.18  1:17 pm   Why did you take so many pictures of random things in October 2009?

     that moment when you just want to make elaborate audio/visual content but it's probably so damn complicated to do it the way you want and would take still many more years of experience to get all the right skills and procedures together, so you get restless and take a walk with a camera to try to maybe cope with the insatiable longing feelings

9.20.18  11:49 am   Did you hear that Spotify will soon let artists upload directly?

     that would be convenient. i wonder if they will let me choose my own letter capitalization

9.20.18  11:46 am   Spotify is soon going to let indie artists upload songs directly without needing a label or third party site. WIll this make the process easier for you?

     yes

      (so we maybe can get more of your songs on the platform)

9.20.18  11:45 am   what does language mean to you

     oh this could get interesting

9.20.18  11:44 am   now, let's say, for example, that i were to pose a question. what would your response be?

     could be something like this

9.20.18  10:56 am   Any plans to tour live with a band?

     oh hell yeah

9.20.18  9:32 am   If organic life (humans) can create digital mind that's superior to humans, can digital mind create organic life that's superior to it?

     sure, but i'm sure the lines would have been blurred well before that point

9.20.18  9:01 am   hey so you were wondering if the gift shop of mt. st. helens is still "there" but I'm curious if you thought the chord on "there" was too regular as just a little 2 5,

     not exactly normal, it slips into a strange key

      since the picture being painted is kind of distant and longing, where as the chord is very straightforward feeling. Though at the same time i understand your choice within the context of the piece and the time limit. curious if you have any tidbits

     the first way it came to me was as it is. when i went to work out the details, i refined it to actually be F over Bb (on "there") was more shiny and exotic that way, and seemed cool because that would actually make it nearly exactly how it happened on "grey" at the same time in the first verse except a half step higher. so i thought that would be the right answer, but then upon run-through in wider context it instantly felt wrong, and it was immediately clear that the way i first had it was better so i switched it back. sometimes what seems to work up close just doesn't work in the real time flow of the song in wider context. that's why full run throughs (like from the beginning) are so important, and the only way to find out what's really gonna work

9.20.18  8:33 am   How does your perception of dogs differ from other peoples perception of dogs?

     i'm not sure what other people's percetion of dogs is, also it surely would vary from dog to dog
